title: U.S. Consumer Spending (Real and Nominal Personal Consumption Expenditures)
description: Yearly aggregation of U.S. consumer spending derived from Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED). Includes both real (inflation-adjusted, chained 2017 dollars) and nominal personal consumption expenditures. Monthly values are averaged to produce yearly estimates.

sources.name: Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED) - Real Personal Consumption Expenditures
sources.provider: U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis via Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis

sources.name: Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED) - Nominal Personal Consumption Expenditures
sources.provider: U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis via Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis

columns.real_consumer_spending: Real Personal Consumption Expenditures in billions of chained 2017 dollars
columns.nominal_consumer_spending: Nominal Personal Consumption Expenditures in billions of current dollars

preservation.format_durability: CSV and JSON formats ensure long-term readability
